text: Can I help you I'm just looking right now thank you Everything in this department is on sale today If I can be of any help just let me know Can I try the sweater on please Certainly the dressing rooms are over there How was it It's a little bit too big do you have a smaller size Did you check the rack Yes but there weren't any I'll have a look in the back I'll be back in a minute Yes we have one Great I'll take it How would you like to pay for that Do you take debit cards Yes of course But if you would like to open an account with us today you'll receive 10% off your first purchase OK that sounds good Just fill out this form and I'll give you a temporary card today your actual card will be mailed in about two weeks with the sale and the extra 10% discount your purchase comes to 4999 including tax What a bargain thank you
